merrfal-description: A platform that allows you to donate items to people in need, the usage is free, just like the donated products.
product-deletion-confirmation-title: Do you want to delete the product
product-deletion-confirmation-message: Are you sure you want to delete this product? This action cannot be undone.
categories-description: Here you can browse a range of added categories, which will facilitate users in finding what they need. This way, you can find what you're looking for faster and more easily.
cta-description: Do it, because giving doesn't make you poor.
contact-the-giver-description: Contact the person who wants to donate the product by phone.
go-to-the-take-place-description: Once you have the location and have set up the meeting, go to the location.
get-the-product-description: Then meet the donor to receive the product and use it.
error-404-description: We're sorry, but the page you're looking for was not found or has been deleted. Please try another page or contact the page administrator for more information.
error-500-description: We're sorry, but we encountered a technical problem. Please try again later or contact the page administrator for more information.
product-description-placeholder: The detailed description of your product, with all its features.
product-was-given: Yes (the product has been given, do not display on the platform)
product-is-not-given: No (the product has not been given, display it on the platform)
supported-formats-info: PNG, JPG, JPEG formats are allowed!
post-anonymously-quesiton: Do you want to post the product anonymously?
post-anonymously: Yes (display my profile with the product)
post-not-anonymously: No (do not display my profile with the product)
user-posted-products-authed: The products you have given, including those posted anonymously.
user-posted-products-not-authed: The user has not given any products or has given them anonymously.
user-product-list: You haven't given any products yet.
users-product-list: The user has not given any products or has given them anonymously.
product-name-regex-validations: The title can only contain letters, numbers, and a single space between words!
product-description-regex-validations: The description can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, commas, periods, and hyphens!
address-regex-validations: The address can only contain letters, numbers, spaces, and the characters ', -, .'
name-can-have-less-than: The title must be less than
name-needs-to-be-at-least: The title must be at least
at-least-one-image-needs-to-be-uploaded: At least one photo must be uploaded to display the product!
select-the-chosen-giving-mode: Select an option for the chosen giving mode!
select-one-category: The product must have a corresponding category!
Select-one-city: Please select the city where the product is given!
phone-number-is-not-valid: The phone number is not valid!
name-regex-validation: The name can only contain letters, numbers, and a single space between words
surname-regex-validation: The surname can only contain letters, numbers, and a single space between words
username-needs-to-be-at-least: The username must be at least
username-can-not-have-less-than: The username cannot be more than
username-regex-validation: The username can only contain letters and numbers without spaces or special characters
description-needs-to-be-at-least: The description must be at least
description-can-not-have-less-than: The description must be less than
address-needs-to-be-at-least: The address must be at least
address-can-not-have-less-than: The address cannot be more than
first-name-needs-to-be-at-least: The first name must be at least
first-name-can-not-have-less-than: The first name cannot be more than
surname-needs-to-be-at-least: The surname must be at least
surname-can-not-have-less-than: The surname cannot be more than
bio-needs-to-be-at-least: The bio must be at least
bio-can-not-have-less-than: The bio must be less than
change-is-not-allowd-for-the-moment: change is not allowed for the moment
firebase-init-error: Error initializing Firebase! Please check your Firebase credentials and make sure you have the necessary permissions to access the Firebase project.
api-status-ok: Our API is operating normally and without any issues.
api-wrong-reqload: The API request failed due to incorrect formatting.
name: Name
email-changing-is-disabled-tooltop: Changing the email address is currently disabled.
help-others-while-adding-a-product: Help others by adding and giving something to those in need.
